creator: Easypaisa
descriptionHtml:
Experience ease through innovative, simple & seamless payments.

Go cashless and use Easypaisa to make online payments. Use it to transfer money, or buy mobile load or offers from your all your favorite telecom operators. You can also make postpaid and utility bill payments, or book bus tickets right from where you’re sitting.

You should also try out some of our new features such as Donations, Insurance & cash deposit in your mobile wallet through Bykea – right at your doorstep.
Try this and much much more by downloading the app That Has It All!


Add Cash to your Account

Add cash to your Easypaisa Wallet by linking any banks debit card to your wallet – securely and conveniently.
Send a request to a Bykea rider from the easypaisa app and get your cash added at your doorstep to your account.


Mobile load & Bill Payment

Get the fastest online recharge & postpaid bill payment for all telecom operators: Telenor, Zong, Ufone & Jazz
Get assured cashbacks and offers on mobile recharge & postpaid bill payment.
Offer Activation
Subscribe to your favorite Call, SMS & Data Offers from Telenor, Zong & Ufone. Not just that but also receive exclusive discounted offers!


Money Transfer

Transfer funds from wallet to wallet or to any other bank account absolutely free (at 0% charge).
Send money to your friends and family anywhere in Pakistan on any valid CNIC or phone number!


Electricity, Gas & Broadband Bill Payment

Pay all your utility bills with just a tap of a button!

Pay electricity bill for IESCO, PEPCO, MEPCO, KESC, K-Electric, FESCO, GEPCO, HESCO, Bahria Town Electricity Supply, LESCO, QESCO

Gas bills for SNGPL & SSGC

Broadband bills for PTCL, SCO, SCO Prepaid Load, PTCL EVO, Naya Tel, Qubee, Wateen, World Call, Wi-Tribe & many more


Send a Tohfa to your loved ones

Send a Tohfa to your friends and family during special occasions like a Birthday or on Eid and add a personal touch to money transfer!


Make donations with ease

Find your preferred charitable organization in one window and make donations through the app with just a click.

Donate to the PM Covid-19 relief fund, Eidhi Foundation, Shifa Trust, Shaukat Khanum (SKMCH), SOS Children’s Village, Cyte Foundation, Redcresaid, Sahara Trust, Care Foundation, The Citizens Foundation (TCF), Saylani Trust, Akhuwat Foundation, PM CJ Dam Fund.


Top up other mobile wallets

Enjoy amazing discounts on Daraz Wallet & Careem wallet top-up.


Invite your friends to the app

Invite your friends to register on the app and earn cash rewards upto Rs. 5,000 every month.


Just go cashless

Make swift payments by scanning our QR Codes at more than 480+ outlets to avail amazing discounts!


Book bus tickets

Get discounts on bus tickets from Daewoo, Bilal Travels, Q-Connect, Skyways and may more! Travel with ease.


Get affordable insurance plans

Ensure a secure future for yourself and your family with easy-to-access insurance products for all your needs.

Buy health insurance plans for yourself starting from Rs. 2 daily subscription and get coverage of upto Rs. 5,000 per month.

Our mobile screen insurance provides you coverage of upto Rs. 10,000 for 12 months on daily & yearly payment plan.

Buy life insurance plans so your loved ones are cared for after you. Starting from a daily subscription of Rs. 2 or Rs. 5. With monthly plans starting from Rs. 60 or Rs. 150.
descriptionShort: Mobile Load, Money Transfer, Bill Payment and much more All within your reach!

Go cashless and use Easypaisa to make online payments. Use it to transfer money, or buy mobile load or offers from your all your favorite telecom operators. You can also make postpaid and utility bill payments, or book bus tickets right from where you’re sitting.

You should also try out some of our new features such as Donations, Insurance & cash deposit in your mobile account through Bykea – right at your doorstep.
Try this and much much more by downloading the app That Has It All!


Add Cash to your Account
Add cash to your Easypaisa Wallet by linking any banks debit card to your wallet – securely and conveniently.
Send a request to a Bykea rider from the easypaisa app and get your cash added at your doorstep to your account.

Mobile load & Bill Payment
Get the fastest online recharge & postpaid bill payment for all telecom operators: Telenor, Zong, Ufone & Jazz
Get assured cashbacks and offers on mobile recharge & postpaid bill payment.
Offer Activation
Subscribe to your favorite Call, SMS & Data Offers from Telenor, Zong & Ufone. Not just that but also receive exclusive discounted offers!

Money Transfer
Transfer funds from wallet to wallet or to any other bank account absolutely free (at 0% charge).
Send money to your friends and family anywhere in Pakistan on any valid CNIC or phone number!
Electricity, Gas & Broadband Bill Payment
Pay all your utility bills with just a tap of a button!

Pay electricity bill for IESCO, PEPCO, MEPCO, KESC, K-Electric, FESCO, GEPCO, HESCO, LESCO, QESCO

Gas bills for SNGPL & SSGC

Broadband bills for PTCL, SCO, SCO Prepaid Load, PTCL EVO, Naya Tel, Qubee, Wateen, World Call, Wi-Tribe & many more

Send a Tohfa to your loved ones
Send a Tohfa to your friends and family during special occasions like a Birthday or on Eid and add a personal touch to money transfer!

Make donations with ease
Find your preferred charitable organization in one window and make donations through the app with just a click.

Donate to the Prime Ministers Relief Fund, Eidhi Foundation, Shifa Trust, Shaukat Khanum (SKMCH), SOS Children’s Village, Cyte Foundation, Redcresaid, Sahara Trust, Care Foundation, The Citizens Foundation (TCF), Saylani Trust, Akhuwat Foundation, PM CJ Dam Fund.

Top up other mobile wallets
Enjoy amazing discounts on Daraz Wallet & Careem wallet top-up.

Invite your friends to the app
Invite your friends to register on the app and earn cash rewards upto Rs. 5,000 every month.

Just go cashless
Make swift payments by scanning our QR Codes at more than 480+ outlets to avail amazing discounts!

Book bus tickets
Get discounts on bus tickets from Daewoo, Bilal Travels, Q-Connect, Skyways and may more! Travel with ease.

Get affordable insurance plans
Ensure a secure future for yourself and your family with easy-to-access insurance products for all your needs.

Buy health insurance plans for yourself starting from Rs. 2 daily subscription and get coverage of upto Rs. 5,000 per month.

Our mobile screen insurance provides you coverage of upto Rs. 10,000 for 12 months on daily & yearly payment plan.

Buy life insurance plans so your loved ones are cared for after you. Starting from a daily subscription of Rs. 2 or Rs. 5. With monthly plans starting from Rs. 60 or Rs. 150.
descriptionShort: Easypaisa - Every network is welcome on Pakistan's Number 1 payments app

title: Easypaisa - Mobile Load, Send Money & Pay Bills

creator: Easypaisa
descriptionHtml:
Adopt the easy life with easypaisa app – innovative, simple & fast. Money transfers, payments and mobile load made easy.

Go cashless and use easypaisa digital wallet for online payments, money transfer, recharging your number, activating any network’s package, or purchasing tickets etc. You can do it all & so much more by just signing-up on easypaisa. Any trouble? Get customer service within the app!
You think it & we make it possible.

How to add cash?
Simply connect your bank’s debit card and add cash easily to your easypaisa account. Spend as you like!

Get Easyload
No more hassle of getting balance through cards or shops. Get your easyload for Telenor, Zong, Ufone or Jazz number through simple steps via easypaisa. Avail bonus rewards & cashbacks too.

Enjoy Bundles
Activate any bundle you like, for all your needs. Data, SMS, or calls, be it Jazz, Telenor, Ufone or Zong, subscribe your favourite packages at discounted rates.

Money Transfer
With easypaisa you can send money to any bank account, any easypaisa account, CNIC, and even transfer to Whatsapp!
Use easypaisa to send money to your Jazzcash, HBL, UBL, Meezan and SimSim accounts. The list goes on!
Now who does all that? Only easypaisa app.
Free, instant, and secure funds transfer from one account to another.
With vast network of easypaisa shops across Pakistan, now you can send or receive money anytime, anywhere.

Pay Bills
Pay all your bills on time without standing in lines. In just few taps, you can clear your bills for electricity (IESCO, PEPCO, K-Electric etc.), gas (SNGPL, SSGC), telephone (PTCL, SCO), internet (Nayatel, Wi-Tribe, Wateen), water (CDA, WSSP etc.), government fees (traffic police challan, Punjab Vehicle Token Tax, FBR - Mobile Phone Tax etc.), Bahria town utility & services fee, buy Airsial tickets and much more. We’ve got all sources for you. You can also pay for your NIMS vaccination certificate fee so save time and join!
Don’t even get into the hassle of adding consumer IDs, just mark your favorite bills in the app and we’ll send you reminders every month.

Send a Tohfa
Don’t know what to gift your friend or family member? Simply send money through easypaisa tohfa to their number. Make birthdays, eids and anniversaries special with a personal touch to money transfer. Never miss an opportunity to express.

Donate
We appreciate your humility to make our society better so choose your preferred charitable organization in one window and make donations through the easypaisa app with just a click.
Donate to the Edhi Foundation, Shifa Trust, Shaukat Khanum (SKMCH), SOS Children’s Village, The Citizens Foundation (TCF), and many others.

Top-up Mobile Wallets
Avail exclusive discounts when you top-up your Careem, Uber, Daraz or M-Tag Wallets.

Rewards on Every Invitation
Invite your friends to register on the easypaisa app and get a cashback for yourself & your friend.

Scan & Pay
Make swift payments by scanning our QR Codes at outlets across Pakistan to avail amazing discounts! Win exciting prizes through Rs. 1 Game.

Travel Easy
Purchase discounted bus tickets on easypaisa app. Book for Daewoo, Bilal Travels, Q-Connect, Skyways and many more! Travel with ease.

Secure Future
Get your desirable insurance plan for as low as Rs. 2, to ensure a secure future for yourself and your family with easy-to-access insurance products for all your needs. For the unforeseen future, easypaisa tahafuz plan gives you coverage of up to Rs. 500,000 in case of accidental death or disability. Protect your mobile phone in cases of theft and damage via easypaisa mobile screen protection plan & easypaisa mobile theft protection plan.

That’s not all!

title: Easypaisa - Mobile Load, Send Money & Pay Bills

creator: Easypaisa
descriptionHtml:
Adopt the easy life with easypaisa app – innovative, simple & fast. Money transfers, payments and mobile load made easy.

Go cashless and use easypaisa digital wallet for online payments, money transfer, recharging your number, activating any network’s package, or purchasing tickets etc. You can do it all & so much more by just signing-up on easypaisa. Any trouble? Get customer service within the app!
You think it & we make it possible.

How to add cash?
Simply connect your bank’s debit card and add cash easily to your easypaisa account. Spend as you like!

Get Easyload
No more hassle of getting balance through cards or shops. Get your easyload for Telenor, Zong, Ufone or Jazz number through simple steps via easypaisa. Avail bonus rewards & cashbacks too.

Enjoy Bundles
Activate any bundle you like, for all your needs. Data, SMS, or calls, be it Jazz, Telenor, Ufone or Zong, subscribe your favourite packages at discounted rates.

Money Transfer
With easypaisa you can send money to any bank account, any easypaisa account, CNIC, and even transfer to Whatsapp!
Use easypaisa to send money to your Jazzcash, HBL, UBL, Meezan and SimSim accounts. The list goes on!
Now who does all that? Only easypaisa app.
Free, instant, and secure funds transfer from one account to another.
With vast network of easypaisa shops across Pakistan, now you can send or receive money anytime, anywhere.

Pay Bills
Pay all your bills on time without standing in lines. In just few taps, you can clear your bills for electricity (IESCO, PEPCO, K-Electric etc.), gas (SNGPL, SSGC), telephone (PTCL, SCO), internet (Nayatel, Wi-Tribe, Wateen), water (CDA, WSSP etc.), government fees (traffic police challan, Punjab Vehicle Token Tax, FBR - Mobile Phone Tax etc.), Bahria town utility & services fee, buy Airsial tickets and much more. We’ve got all sources for you. You can also pay for your NIMS vaccination certificate fee so save time and join!
Don’t even get into the hassle of adding consumer IDs, just mark your favorite bills in the app and we’ll send you reminders every month.

Send a Tohfa
Don’t know what to gift your friend or family member? Simply send money through easypaisa tohfa to their number. Make birthdays, eids and anniversaries special with a personal touch to money transfer. Never miss an opportunity to express.

Donate
We appreciate your humility to make our society better so choose your preferred charitable organization in one window and make donations through the easypaisa app with just a click.
Donate to the Edhi Foundation, Shifa Trust, Shaukat Khanum (SKMCH), SOS Children’s Village, The Citizens Foundation (TCF), and many others.

Top-up Mobile Wallets
Avail exclusive discounts when you top-up your Careem, Uber, Daraz or M-Tag Wallets.

Rewards on Every Invitation
Invite your friends to register on the easypaisa app and get a cashback for yourself & your friend.

Scan & Pay
Make swift payments by scanning our QR Codes at outlets across Pakistan to avail amazing discounts! Win exciting prizes through Rs. 1 Game.

Travel Easy
Purchase discounted bus tickets on easypaisa app. Book for Daewoo, Bilal Travels, Q-Connect, Skyways and many more! Travel with ease.

Secure Future
Get your desirable insurance plan for as low as Rs. 2, to ensure a secure future for yourself and your family with easy-to-access insurance products for all your needs. For the unforeseen future, easypaisa tahafuz plan gives you coverage of up to Rs. 500,000 in case of accidental death or disability. Protect your mobile phone in cases of theft and damage via easypaisa mobile screen protection plan & easypaisa mobile theft protection plan.

That’s not all!
Order groceries via our mini-app by selecting your products at Grocers.
Shop PUBG vouchers on Midasbuy.
Peel & win with Sprite & easypaisa.
Manage all your investments through NBP Funds, Atlas Assets, JS Investments etc. all on one platform!
DAILY REWARDS, PROMOTIONS, CASHBACKS, YOU GET IT ALL
DOWNLOAD EASYPAISA NOW!

Simply link your bank’s debit card and add cash easily to your easypaisa account. Spend as you like!

Money Transfer
Sending money is easy in 3 simple steps. With easypaisa you can send money to any bank account, easypaisa account, CNIC, mobile number and even transfer to Whatsapp! Transfer money to your Jazzcash, HBL, UBL, Meezan and SimSim accounts. The list goes on!
Free, instant and secure transfer from one account to another.

Get Easyload
No more hassle of getting balance through cards or shops. Get your easyload for Telenor, Zong, Ufone or Jazz number through simple steps via easypaisa. Avail bonus rewards & cashbacks too.

Enjoy Bundles
Activate packages for any network. Data, SMS, or calls, be it Jazz, Telenor, Ufone or Zong, subscribe the package of choice at discounted rates.

Pay Bills
Pay all your bills on time without standing in lines. In just a few taps, you can clear your bills for electricity (IESCO, PEPCO, KESC etc.), gas (SNGPL, SSGC), telephone (PTCL, SCO), internet (Nayatel, Wi-Tribe, Wateen), water (CDA, WSSP etc.), solar, government fees (e-Challan, Punjab Vehicle Token Tax, FBR - Mobile Phone Tax etc.) and more. We’ve got all sources for you. You can also pay for your NIMS vaccination certificate fee so save time and join!

Mark your regular bills in the app and we’ll send you reminders every month without the need of consumer IDs.

Send a Tohfa
Don’t know what to gift? Simply send money in easypaisa tohfa. Make birthdays, eids and anniversaries special with a personal touch to money transfer. Never miss an opportunity to express.

Donate
Support charitable causes in one window and make donations through easypaisa app. Donate to the Edhi Foundation, Shifa Trust, Shaukat Khanum (SKMCH), SOS Children’s Village, The Citizens Foundation (TCF), and many others.

Top-up Mobile Wallets
Avail exclusive discounts when you top-up your Careem, Uber, Daraz or M-Tag Wallets.

Rewards on Invitation
Invite your friends to register on easypaisa app and get a cashback for yourself & your friend.

Scan & Pay
Make swift payments by scanning our QR Codes at outlets across Pakistan to avail amazing discounts! Win exciting prizes through Rs. 1 Game.

Travel Easy
Purchase discounted bus tickets on easypaisa app. Book for Daewoo, Bilal Travels, Q-Connect, Skyways and many more! Travel with ease.

Secure Future
Get your desirable insurance plan for as low as Rs. 2, to ensure a secure future for yourself and your family with easy-to-access insurance products for all your needs. For the unforeseen future, easypaisa tahafuz plan gives you coverage of up to Rs. 500,000 in case of accidental death or disability. Protect your mobile phone in cases of theft and damage via mobile screen protection plan & mobile theft protection plan.

That’s not all!
Order groceries via our mini-app by selecting your products at Grocers.
Shop PUBG vouchers on Midasbuy.
Manage all your investments through NBP Funds, Atlas Assets, JS Investments etc. all on one platform!

title: Easypaisa - Payments Made Easy

creator: Easypaisa
descriptionHtml:
Money matters made easy with easypaisa – free, simple & fast


Take it easy when you can pay online, send money, recharge balance, activate bundles, buy tickets and do more with easypaisa. Just register easypaisa and enjoy 😍


New features 📢


▶️ Increase your account limit through biometric verification within easypaisa app
▶️ Create Asaan Digital Account on easypaisa app
▶️ Invest in Faysal Funds through easypaisa
▶️ Transfer funds with RAAST
▶️ Make money with easypaisa saving plan


Get ready to make your life easy in so many ways:




Money Transfer 💸


Sending money is easy with easypaisa. You can send money to:
● any bank account like HBL Konnect, UBL, Meezan etc
● easypaisa account
● CNIC number
● Mobile number like JazzCash, or RAAST
● and Whatsapp
Free, instant and secure transfer from easypaisa to anyone


Bill Payment ⚡


Pay any bill with easypaisa in a few minutes for:
● electricity (IESCO, PEPCO, KESC etc.)
● gas (SNGPL, SSGC)
● telephone (PTCL, SCO)
● internet (Nayatel, Wi-Tribe, Wateen)
● water (CDA, WSSP etc.)
● government fees (e-Challan, FBR - Mobile Phone Tax etc.)
● or solar


Set bill reminders to pay bill without re-entering consumer ID


Mobile Bundles 📱


Activate bundles for Telenor, Zong, Ufone or Jazz
● Get data bundles for Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, TikTok or Snack Video
● Enjoy SMS, or call bundles and chat with your family and friends


150+ Mobile Bundles for all networks


Easyload 💚


Avail bonus, rewards and cashbacks on:
● Telenor Load
● Zong Load
● Ufone Load
● Jazz Load


Easy cash 😮


Get instant digital loan without any document in easypaisa app


NADRA Payments ✌️


Pay for NIMS Vaccination Certificate or CNIC fees within easypaisa app


Saving Plans 🤝


Activate your favourite plan with one tap subscription and get up to 10% profit every day


Bus Tickets 🚌


Buy discounted bus tickets for:
● Daewoo, Bilal Travels, Q-Connect, Skyways and many more!


One Rupee Game 💯


Play to win iPhone, iPad, Apple watch, Samsung phones and other exciting prizes


Mini App 🤩

title: Easypaisa - Payments Made Easy

creator: Easypaisa
descriptionHtml:
Adopt the easy life with easypaisa app – innovative, simple & fast. Money transfers, payments and mobile load made easy.

Go cashless and use easypaisa digital wallet for online payments, money transfer, recharging your number, activating any network’s package, or purchasing tickets etc. You can do it all & so much more by just signing-up on easypaisa. Any trouble? Get customer service within the app!
You think it & we make it possible.

Add Cash
Simply link your bank’s debit card and add cash easily to your easypaisa account. Spend as you like!

Money Transfer
Sending money is easy in 3 simple steps. With easypaisa you can send money to any bank account, easypaisa account, CNIC, mobile number and even transfer to Whatsapp! Transfer money to your Jazzcash, HBL, UBL, Meezan and SimSim accounts. The list goes on!
Free, instant and secure transfer from one account to another.

Get Easyload
No more hassle of getting balance through cards or shops. Get your easyload for Telenor, Zong, Ufone or Jazz number through simple steps via easypaisa. Avail bonus rewards & cashbacks too.

Enjoy Bundles
Activate packages for any network. Data, SMS, or calls, be it Jazz, Telenor, Ufone or Zong, subscribe the package of choice at discounted rates.

Pay Bills
Pay all your bills on time without standing in lines. In just a few taps, you can clear your bills for electricity (IESCO, PEPCO, KESC etc.), gas (SNGPL, SSGC), telephone (PTCL, SCO), internet (Nayatel, Wi-Tribe, Wateen), water (CDA, WSSP etc.), solar, government fees (e-Challan, Punjab Vehicle Token Tax, FBR - Mobile Phone Tax etc.) and more. We’ve got all sources for you. You can also pay for your NIMS vaccination certificate fee so save time and join!

Mark your regular bills in the app and we’ll send you reminders every month without the need of consumer IDs.

Send a Tohfa
Don’t know what to gift? Simply send money in easypaisa tohfa. Make birthdays, eids and anniversaries special with a personal touch to money transfer. Never miss an opportunity to express.

Donate
Support charitable causes in one window and make donations through easypaisa app. Donate to the Edhi Foundation, Shifa Trust, Shaukat Khanum (SKMCH), SOS Children’s Village, The Citizens Foundation (TCF), and many others.

Top-up Mobile Wallets
Avail exclusive discounts when you top-up your Careem, Uber, Daraz or M-Tag Wallets.

Rewards on Invitation
Invite your friends to register on easypaisa app and get a cashback for yourself & your friend.

Scan & Pay
Make swift payments by scanning our QR Codes at outlets across Pakistan to avail amazing discounts! Win exciting prizes through Rs. 1 Game.

Travel Easy
Purchase discounted bus tickets on easypaisa app. Book for Daewoo, Bilal Travels, Q-Connect, Skyways and many more! Travel with ease.

Secure Future
Get your desirable insurance plan for as low as Rs. 2, to ensure a secure future for yourself and your family with easy-to-access insurance products for all your needs. For the unforeseen future, easypaisa tahafuz plan gives you coverage of up to Rs. 500,000 in case of accidental death or disability. Protect your mobile phone in cases of theft and damage via mobile screen protection plan & mobile theft protection plan.

That’s not all!
Order groceries via our mini-app by selecting your products at Grocers.
Shop PUBG vouchers on Midasbuy.
Manage all your investments through NBP Funds, Atlas Assets, JS Investments etc. all on one platform!
DAILY REWARDS, PROMOTIONS, CASHBACKS, YOU GET IT ALL
DOWNLOAD EASYPAISA NOW!

👏 Titanium – 14%

👏 Silver – 7%

🟠 Ufone easyload
🔴 Jazz easyload

Please note Personal Loans are only available to Pakistan Citizens within the territory of Pakistan

creator: Telenor Microfinance Bank Limited
descriptionHtml:
Send money, get mobile load, activate packages, or start saving, do it all!

Psst.. did we mention that you will get Rs. 100 as sign-up reward?

🥁 Introducing Term Deposits
Start investing with plans as short as 7 days, tailored to your financial goals. Enjoy guaranteed profits and a fully digital, hassle-free experience!

Key features:

- Monthly Account limit of up to Rs. 25 lakh
- Biometric verification within easypaisa app
- No hidden charges on transfers or payments
- Win exciting prizes every month

Get ready to make your life easy in so many ways:

Transfer money
easypaisa app has made sending money easy across Pakistan. You can transfer money to any of the following:

· any bank account like HBL Konnect, UBL, Meezan, Alfalah, Allied, Askari, NBP etc
· easypaisa account
· Mobile wallets like JazzCash, SadaPay, NayaPay etc.
· WhatsApp
· CNIC number
· Raast Transfer

Free, instant, and secure transfer from easypaisa app to anyone

Save and earn profit daily
Subscribe to savings plan in one tap and receive profits of up to 14% annually. Available Plans:

Diamond– 14%
Titanium – 12%
Platinum – 10%
Gold – 7%
Silver – 5%

Save for your saving goals with savings pocket and earn rewards on timely payments!

Pay Bills
Pay all utility bills in one app:

· electricity (IESCO, PESCO, K-Electric etc.)
· gas (SNGPL, SSGC)
· telephone (PTCL, SCO)
· internet (Nayatel, Wi-Tribe etc.)
· water (CDA, WSSP, etc.)
· government fees (e-Challan, FBR - Mobile Phone Tax, etc.)

Set reminders to pay bills without re-entering consumer ID

Activate mobile packages
Subscribe to your favorite bundles for Telenor, Zong, Ufone or Jazz, ONIC, ROX.
Get data bundles for Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, TikTok, or Snack Video.
Enjoy SMS or call packages
275+ Mobile packages for all networks
Pay your post-paid bills
Schedule your mobile load & packages payments

Easycash

Need instant money? Apply for easycash loan without any documents and get up to Rs. 25,000 in your account.

Tenor: Day of disbursement to no less than 60 Days

Loan Amount: PKR 200 - PKR 25,000
Max APR: 32%-40% (customer is not charged more than 32% - 40% in a year for a loan)
Please note Personal Loans are only available to Pakistan Citizens in the territory of Pakistan
Privacy Policy: https://easypaisa.com.pk/privacy-policy/
Example of a loan with easypaisa:
Loan Amount: PKR 20,000
Tenor: No less than 60 Days
Service Fee: 32%
Total service fee: PKR 6,400
Disbursed Amount: 20,000
Repayment Amount: 26,400
Repaying your loan is now more convenient than ever! You can pay off your dues through the easypaisa app

Top-up wallets
Avail discounts when you recharge your Daraz or M-Tag Wallets

Invite & earn
Invite your friends to register on easypaisa and get cashback for both of you

Scan & pay
Scan, pay, and go! Enjoy instant QR payments at merchants nationwide
Scan and pay with any banking app using easypaisa Raast QR
Participate in monthly scan & competitions to win prizes

One Rupee Game
Play to win iPhone, iPad, Apple watch, Samsung phones and other prizes

Insurance
Protect yourself and your loved ones with insurance starting at just Rs. 1. With hassle-free documentation and one-click subscription, securing your future has never been this easy!

All your favorite things are now here in easypaisa:
Order food from restaurants
Travel across Pakistan by booking hotels, flights and buses
Get movie tickets

Any complaints? Receive customer support from easypaisa!

You can now update your personal information, file a complaint about a failed bank transfer, cancel a CNIC transaction, or alter the pin on your debit card using easypaisa app.
